p: The surface and cross-section of the films were performed using a scanning electron microscope (Tabletop Microscope Hitachi, TM 300, Tokyo, Japan) operating at an acceleration voltage of 15 kV. To evaluate the surface and cross-section, the films were freeze dried and fixed to the equipment support with double-sided conductive copper tape (Ted Pella, Inc.â€”Redding, CA, USA).
